pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/wireservice/leather.png :target: https://travis-ci.org/wireservice/leather :alt: Build status.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dw/leather.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/leather :alt: PyPI downloads.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/leather.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/leather :alt: Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/leather.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/leather :alt: License.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/leather.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/leather :alt: Support Python versionsLeather is the Python charting library for those who need charts *now* and don't care if they're perfect.Leather isn't picky. It's rough. It gets dirty. It looks sexy just hanging on the back of a chair. Leather doesn't need your accessories. Leather is how Snake Plissken would make charts.Get it?Important links:* Documentation: http://leather.rtfd.io* Repository: https://github.com/wireservice/leather* Issues: https://github.com/wireservice/leather/issues
